name: Headbutt
shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.
isFieldMove: The Pokémon can shake a small tree which may cause a wild Pokémon to fall down. It can be taught to a Pokémon by using TM02 in Generation II. Though available as a level up move in Generation I and future generations, it only had status as a field move in Generation II and Generation IV's HeartGold and SoulSilver.
